main event: On January 16, 1958, the crew of the Brazilian Navy ship 'Almirante Saldanha' observed and photographed a metallic, disc-shaped object hovering over Trinidade Island.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 40 feet in diameter and hovering at an estimated altitude of 2,000 feet., The object ascended vertically at a high speed and disappeared from view in less than 10 seconds., Multiple crew members reported seeing the object, and several photographs were taken during the sighting., The Brazilian Navy received a significant number of UFO reports from personnel aboard the ship, with sightings described as silver metallic and disc-shaped., The Brazilian Navy initially dismissed the incident, but later reports acknowledged the authenticity of the photographs taken.
witness description: crew members of the Brazilian Navy ship 'Almirante Saldanha'
